title: Bus over broker strategy
summary: Prefer distributed eventing and explicit contracts over centralized broker orchestration for long-term agility.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Central brokers become bottlenecks and knowledge silos; modernization needs scalable ownership.
whenToUse: Integration portfolio is large and growing
whenNotToUse: The platform is small, stable, and centrally owned with low change frequency

gotchas: Teams assume the bus removes need for design
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Use the bus to decouple, not to avoid responsibility. Ownership and contracts are mandatory.
